thread.section_title: Ties.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ties.com | www.ties.com
thread.title: Kiersta Borrego

author: Kiersta Borrego
title: Kiersta Borrego
text:
I bought this tie for the groomsmen in our wedding party. It is amazing! Such great quality, and looks really nice. I cannot wait for all the guys to wear them.
Also, the customer service for this company is outstanding. The mailman lost my first package, so I called to ask ties.com what I should do and they told me it was not a problem, and sent me a replacement tie no questions asked! They were awesome to work with. I would definitely recommend them not only for the quality of the tie, but for their customer service too. Great company.
